source:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_SEQ_00Zukin has an eye for eggs.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
※本クエストは受注時のクラス・ジョブでのみ進行します。

碧のタマミズのズキンは、御機嫌な依頼があるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_00<tab>Lure out tatsunoko with live ruby shrimp near Sakazuki and slay them for their roe.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_00サカズキ島付近のでを使い
現れたからを入手

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the tatsunoko roe to the cook at the Ruby Price.
target: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_01<tab>紅玉台場の台場の台所番に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DF401 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the fine Hingan wine to Zukin.

TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the very <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> I was seeking. There is a task I would have you perform in the name of trade relations.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_000さん、よく来てくれたなぁ～！
商いと縁のために、仕事を頼まれてほしいんだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>Take these live ruby shrimp and release them along the shore of Sakazuki. This will lure out tatsunoko, whose roe you may then harvest.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_001この「」を、サカズキ島の海岸で撒いてくれぇ～！
すると、卵を持ったタツノコが現れるから、そいつをぶっ倒して、
「」を2つ手に入れてほしいんだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_002<tab>Once you have the roe, pray deliver it to the cook at the Ruby Price. He will know what to do with it. My thanks in advance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_002手に入れた魚卵は、紅玉台場の「台場の台所番」に渡してくれぇ～！
よろしく頼むぜぇ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_020<tab>Looking for the cook? You've found him. What is it you require?
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_020台場の台所を仕切ってるのは、この俺だ。
何か用か？

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_021<tab>Oho, if this isn't tatsunoko roe, and some of the freshest I've seen! Compliments of Zukin, you say? Well, how thoughtful of him!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_021こりゃ、「」じゃないか！
なるほど、ズキンの代わりに届けにきてくれたってか。
そいつは、ご苦労さん。

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_022<tab>In case you didn't know, tatsunoko roe is a rare delicacy. I'll be able to prepare such a treat for our troops as they seldom enjoy! Now, such kindness shouldn't go unacknowledged...
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_022は、珍味として有名でな！
コイツを出してやれば、台場の防人たちも大喜びさ。
こっちも、特別な品で礼をしなくちゃな！

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_023<tab>One of the finest wines I have in my stores. Please give it to Zukin along with my regards. And with that, I take my leave─I have a feast to prepare!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_COOK02998_000_023この「」を「ズキン」に渡してくれ。
「これからも、よろしくな」と伝言も頼む。
では、飯の支度があるので、これにて失礼するぞ。

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_030<tab>...Our gift was so well received that we received one in return? Wonderful!
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_030さん、依頼の品を届けてくれたかぁ～！
なに、台所番から礼の品を受け取ってきたってぇ～！？

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_031<tab><sniff> Ah, this is truly a fine rice wine. We've not the means to brew our own, so it is doubly appreciated. My thanks for handling the task, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_031おお～、こりゃあいい香りの酒だぁ～！
米の酒は、俺たちじゃ作れねぇから助かるぜぇ～！
その上、台所番からの嬉しい伝言まで、ありがとよぉ～！

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_032<tab>Ever since we began trading with Kokajiya, travel to Kugane has become a regularity. This in turn led to more opportunities for contact with the Ruby Price.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_032さんが、小鍛冶屋と縁を結んだおかげで、
多くの仲間がクガネに行くようになってなぁ～。
自然と、紅玉台場に立ち寄る機会が増えたんだぁ～。

source: TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_033<tab>For now, the fortification serves simply as a convenient waypoint, but ere long it will become a destination in its own right. Our efforts to establish new trade channels continue to flourish, and we owe no small part of our success to you.
target:
TEXT_BANKJN602_02998_ZUKIN_000_033そのうちに、台所番とも縁が結ばれて、
今じゃ、こんなにいい取引が続いてるってわけよぉ～。
ありがたやぁ～、ありがたやぁ～！
